rows.label: tlk4310014101_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm doing lots of helping out. All
good training to become a Driver!

rows.label: tlk4310014101_msg0002
rows.name:
Once I'm a Driver, I'm gonna go
visit all sorts of mercenary bands.

rows.label: tlk4310014101_msg0003
rows.name:
That way, I'll get to
travel all over Alst.

rows.label: tlk4310014101_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll do whatever it takes
to find the guy who got my
mum and dad killed...
